name: Card Combat (xamuil2)
description:
Welcome to Card Combat, a game made in 72 hours for Mini Jam 69. 

Instructions:  MOUSE to move up and down, and CLICK to launch the card in front of you. You must launch cards that are the SAME COLOR as the enemy card in order to defeat them. Don't let the enemy cards get to your glove and can you survive till the end? (A boss is yet to be added)

This is my second game jam game. Let me know if you enjoyed playing :)
